mapper.select: SELECT A."hihokenshaKana", A."hihokenshaName", A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo", A."hihokenshaNo", A."ninteiShinseiYMD", A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" FROM rgdb."DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS A INNER JOIN "FairudetaIchijiTeburuTemp" AS B ON A."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = B."hokenshabango" AND A."hihokenshaNo" = B."hihokenjabango" AND A."ninteiShinseiYMD" = B."ninteishinseibi" AND A."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = B."shinseikubunshinseiji" WHERE B."hihokenjakanashimei" IS NULL AND B."hihokenjakanjishimei" IS NULL
